title: Flirting Threesome
description: From the very beginning, it was a thought to have a star running in the lawn without shirt – I was thinking to plot this idea after having a lot of homework on this; but, don’t know how I started writing on this very next day. “Flirt Threesome” is novel based story; which shows that how a busy star appoint a bodyguard for his younger sister and how the social matters lead her to have an affair with the same bodyguard – that resulted into confidence then love and at the end sex. I am thankful to my editors, colleagues and fans to like my earlier novels and to help me presenting this short story.
author: J. Nawaz
